section.name: About Project
section.p: Checkstyle Beans project contains the set of NetBeans modules needed for annotation of the code that does not match the defined Checkstyle rules. It works inside the editor, displaying the results as soon as the edited file is saved.
See the Changes Report for the complete overview of recent changes.
